abstract: An overwhelming majority of Vodafone Group shareholders slapped down a proposal by a rebel investor to spin off the company’s 45 percent stake in Verizon Wireless.
lead_paragraph: An overwhelming majority of Vodafone Group shareholders slapped down a proposal by a rebel investor to spin off the company’s 45 percent stake in Verizon Wireless.

headline.main: Vodafone Investors Hang Up on Call for Verizon Stake Sale
